dataset_description.Name: Stop-signal task with spoken & manual responses
dataset_description.ReferencesAndLinks: Xue, G., Aron, A.R., Poldrack, R.A. (2008). Common neural substrates for inhibition of spoken and manual responses. Cereb Cortex, 18(8):1923-32. doi: 10.1093/cercor/bhm220
